comfort.title: Comfort and Quality
comfort.shortDescription: Spacious, bright rooms equipped with all essential comforts for a pleasant stay
comfort.expandedContent:
Our rooms are equipped with all comforts:
- Private bathroom
- TV in every room
- Free Wi-Fi
- Telephone
- Laundry use for long stays

Each room has independent access, with the possibility to choose between double bed, two single beds or adding a third bed. Silence and privacy are guaranteed thanks to the quiet location and private internal parking.

location.title: Strategic Location
location.shortDescription: The B&B is located in the most panoramic and residential area of Cantù, with open views and maximum tranquility
location.expandedContent:
A perfect base to explore: 
- Como and the Lake (15 min)
- Milan and its fairs (30–40 min)
- Monza and its racetrack (30 min)
- Lugano (Switzerland) (40 min).
Other nearby places:
- 5 minutes from Cantù Hospital 
- 15 min from S. Anna Hospital in Como
- 5 km from eCampus University in Novedrate.

relax.title: Relax and Nature
relax.shortDescription: The B&B is surrounded by a private 1,500 sqm garden, perfect for those seeking peace and relaxation
relax.expandedContent: The only common area is a large kitchen where breakfast is served. Pet Friendly – Four-legged friends are welcome!

short_rental.title: Short Rental – Two-Room Apartment
short_rental.shortDescription: For those who need medium-long stays (from 1 to 18 months), we also offer a furnished two-room apartment just 800m from the B&B
short_rental.expandedContent: Located in a quiet condominium context. Raised floor, ideal for 1–2 adults. Completely furnished with utilities included: water, electricity, heating, condominium expenses. Well connected with Como and main services (bus, bar, schools, tobacco shops).
